function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Messaging on caloric count and food choices in restaurants","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness of the term \\'social distancing\\'","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid change in social behaviors and habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded places and non-essential gatherings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to virtual reality technology in low-income countries due to high cost and computing power requirement.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor internet infrastructure and slow internet speed impeding the full realization of virtual reality technology.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of technical virtual reality experts to develop virtual reality applications suitable for medical education and healthcare.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improperly adjusted head-mounted virtual reality devices causing blurry images and text","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Securing electronic medical records using blockchain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intrinsic experience in a safe virtual environment using blockchain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integrating point-of-care diagnostics for self-testing of covid-19 patients in isolation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to a large covid-19 dataset for training and testing ai models","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the potential of blockchain in health systems","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of autonomous robots in the interconnected iomt infrastructure may lead to bias and breach of privacy in collecting samples from infected patients.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous network protocols and smart applications in remote consultation could lead to privacy and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear who regulations and policies on the use of autonomous and unmanned iomt concepts in fighting covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sharing of covid-19 data may breach privacy and security of the individuals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy as infection status is shown to all","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis of covid-19 patients lack of quality test","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to spatial covid-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scalability problems with remote consultations and diagnosis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns with contact-tracing apps","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Regional integration of electronic health records of suspected covid-19 individuals as they travel from one country to the other","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tracking of home-quarantined individuals using gps and mobile phones","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Malicious attack of iomt healthcare equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal identification with safety systems could breach privacy and security of health systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote collection of covid-19 pandemic data using blockchain records could pose privacy risks.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of implementing blockchain technology in health systems could lead to security vulnerabilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 misinformation causing fear and panic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stigmatization and anxiety related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Generation of noisy data for covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to detect asymptomatic covid-19 cases in ct images","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent international regulations for covid-19 chest ct image data sharing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor data quality and sharing in covid-19 chest ct image analysis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ethical issues and technology vulnerability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlapping in the identification of covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-persons","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ethical framework and acceptable use of emerging technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges in contact tracing process, including identification, privacy violation, and monitoring.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of physical addresses, street names, and identification cards for contact-persons.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased exposure of contact tracing personnel to covid-19 and potential stigmatization.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Analysis of people’s migration patterns leading to privacy concerns and ethical implications","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misuse of contact tracing data for unethical purposes","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependency on technology for covid-19 detection and monitoring","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited use of ai technologies due to lack of data for tracking and prediction of covid-19 cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of rt-pcr test kits leading to delays in covid-19 diagnosis","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate and unreliable ai forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Search string focusing on contagious diseases could lead to biased results and miss important studies related to other diseases or areas publication bias.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithms for quality assessment may overlook important nuances and context in the evaluation of research articles.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
